contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Kumenan |JapaneseName= 久米南町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Map Kumenan en,.png |Region= [[Chūgoku region|Chūgoku]] |Prefecture= [[Okayama Prefecture|Okayama]] |District= [[Kume District, Okayama|Kume]] |Area_km2= 78.60 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 5,881 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 34 |LatitudeMinutes = 56 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 133 |LongtitudeMinutes = 58 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.kumenan.okayama.jp/ Town of Kumenan] }} {{nihongo|'''Kumenan'''|久米南町|Kumenan-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kume District, Okayama|Kume District]], [[Okayama Prefecture|Okayama]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 5,881 and a [[population density|density]] of 74.82 persons per km². The total area is 78.60 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.kumenan.okayama.jp/ Town of Kumenan] {{ja icon}} *{{Wikivoyage-inline|Kumenan}} [[Category:Towns in Okayama Prefecture]] {{Okayama-geo-stub}}
